text: Allahanira mahinaharuko sankhya tyasa dinadekhi jaba usale akasaharu ra dhartiko srsti garyo bahra chan. Uniharumadhye cara adara ra sam'manaka hun, yahi sojho dharma ho. Atah timi yi mahinaharuma aphumathi atyacara nagara ra musrikaharusita sabaimilera jihada gara, juna prakarale uniharu sabai milera timisita laddachan. Ra janirakha ki allaha atmasanyamiharuko sathama cha
